snippet: District Judge G. Todd Baugh, 72, who drew condemnation for saying a 14-year-old rape victim appeared “older than her chronological age,” said he planned to retire.
abstract: Montana District Judge G Todd Baugh, who drew condemnation for his comments about a 14-year-old rape victim, says he plans to retire at end of 2014.
lead_paragraph: District Judge G. Todd Baugh, 72, who drew condemnation for saying a 14-year-old rape victim appeared “older than her chronological age,” said he planned to retire.
